name: Paper (MCR Alpine, Autoupdating) [v1.1 beta]
author: ddd@jcx.ovh
description: High performance Spigot fork that aims to fix gameplay and mechanics inconsistencies.

variables.name: (Optional) Minecraft Version
variables.description:
The version of minecraft (e.g. "1.16.1") to download. 

Leave blank to always get the latest version.

variables.name: (Optional) Override Jar Path
variables.description: Set this value to the path of a jar (/home/container/$X) to skip the automatic download and run it directly.
